channel.title: AviorRSPS | Deadman | OSRS | Bounty Hunter | Bossing/Economy
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://avior-rsps.com/public/style_images/6_avior.png[/img]
Avior is a Build off impact server, The style of the server came from the beloved BattleScape Isle. There are many types of PvP, we have created our very own kind of deadman mode, We have 7 mini-quests, There will be more added as we go we are currently loading 103 data not all of it but eventually we will have full data. The point in the server is to have fun you can get cash and items easily. Bosses are they key to the server when it comes to better gear.
[LEFT][B]Features [/B]
[ul][*]Bounty Hunter [*]6 Quests [*]Deadman Mode [*]OpenGL HD [*]13+ Skills [*]10+ Minigames[/ul]
[B]Features Coming[/B]
[ul][*]Full Cyberus [*]Full Zulrah [*]Completed Deadman Features [*]Any OSRS Updates[/ul]
[/LEFT]
[U][B][SIZE=4]Staff[/SIZE][/B][/U] Logan Beast_ Myself
[size=24pt][URL=http://"www.avior-rsps.com"]Webiste[/URL][/size] Sign up there will be a beta soon! ETA: January 1st Sign up on forums for early access on Christmas! Become a beta tester, shoot me a PM on the forums and have access instantly if granted
[img]https://i.gyazo.com/05ee4477993cbc82b3bcf87bd03e45aa.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Tjmufnu.png[/img]
[B]Shooting Stars[/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/whKNkXS.gif[/img]
[B]Questing[/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qasgvkE.gif[/img]
[B]Exploring[/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/chCaZZ7.gif[/img]
[B]Bounty Hunter[/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5b6rtX3.png[/img]
[B]Bank Raids[/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hfyfjpg.png[/img]
[B]Kraken[/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/bGrQkkX.gif[/img]
[B]Kalpthie Queen[/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4XadATM.gif[/img]
[B]Entrana[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2nDlMN0.gif[/img]
[B]Crash Island[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/clzRPjC.gif[/img]
[U][B]Credits[/B][/U] Impact Paragon
[/CENTER]

item.title: AviorRSPS | Deadman | OSRS | Bounty Hunter | Bossing/Economy
item.dc:creator: @Just_Creative Just Creative
item.description:
@Just_Creative wrote:

Great server. Only problem is it that the server don’t really give it time once they’re choosing a staff member. Overall great server can’t wait for release.

Read full topic

item.title: AviorRSPS | Deadman | OSRS | Bounty Hunter | Bossing/Economy
item.dc:creator: @Keldagrim Keldagrim
item.description:
@Keldagrim wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:4, topic:554193”]What is the bank raiding?

Looks interesting as long as it’s balanced as I wouldn’t ever put my time into a server like this where someone could easily take my items for no reason.[/quote]

Its for the deadman mode.

Avior is a Build off impact server, The style of the server came from the beloved BattleScape Isle.
There are many types of PvP, we have created our very own kind of deadman mode, We have 7 mini-quests,
There will be more added as we go we are currently loading 103 data not all of it but eventually we will have full data.
The point in the server is to have fun you can get cash and items easily. Bosses are they key to the server when it comes to better gear.
